vulnerability.name: USN-5479-2
vulnerability.description: USN-5479-1 fixed vulnerabilities in PHP. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Charles Fol discovered that PHP incorrectly handled initializing certain  arrays when handling the pg_query_params function. A remote attacker could  use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or  possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-31625)    Charles Fol discovered that PHP incorrectly handled passwords in mysqlnd. A  remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash, resulting in a  denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-31626)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in PHP. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
